description.value:
Frequency once per hour

Trigger An enemy reduces you to 0 Hit Points but doesn't kill you.

Your commitment to protecting others keeps you going, even against insurmountable odds. Instead of being knocked out, you're reduced to 1 Hit Point. You increase your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Wounded] value by 1 and gain a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level that last for 1 round.
